summary: Modern Cinderella-romance where a young successful lawyer panics when he finds that he has fallen for a working-class girl.
cast: Lacey Chabert|Ryan Merriman|Hedy Burress|Jonathan Bennett|Patty McCormack|Allison McAtee|Joey King|Tanja Reichert|Benton Jennings|Jeanette Miller|Sean McGowan|Edith Jefferson|Nick LaTour|Suzan Brittan|Priscilla Barnes|Jerald Garner
title: Elevator Girl
